parameters.name: showHand
parameters.description: Show the hand graphic when moving disks

parameters.name: useReverse
parameters.description: Reverse the order of stacks (mirror image)

parameters.name: testtype
parameters.description: Test configuration: 1=Progressive 3-5 disks, 2=Random 3-5 disks, 3=Shallice 12 problems, 4=Shallice 30 random, 5=Phillips A, 6=Phillips B, 7=Phillips C, 8=Fimbel Old (15 trials), 9=Fimbel Young (35 trials), 0=TOL-R (30 trials), 10=TOL-DX (15 trials)

parameters.name: timelimit
parameters.description: Time limit in seconds for each problem (when time limits are enabled)

parameters.name: allowreset
parameters.description: Allow participant to reset/restart a problem (up to 3 attempts)

parameters.name: allowskip
parameters.description: Allow participant to skip a problem
